alert.note: Alert for Durham; Granville; Orange; Person (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 12 at 3:55PM EDT until September 12 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Person County in central North Carolina... Northeastern Orange County in central North Carolina... Southwestern Granville County in central North Carolina... Northwestern Durham County in central North Carolina... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 355 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hillsborough, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Durham, Butner, Rougemont, Stem, Lake Michie, Lake Butner, Moriah, Eno River State Park, Berea and Bahama. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
